welcome_message_body: Welcome to Munster, a charming city known for its friendly community and beautiful landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to Delta Air Lines and Porter Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is home to United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Porter County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
